synergyviewcore.collections.ui

Interface AbstractMediaCollectionControl.CollectionMediaListener

  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractMediaCollectionControl

    public static interface AbstractMediaCollectionControl.CollectionMediaListener
    The listener interface for receiving collectionMedia events. The class that is interested in processing a collectionMedia event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addCollectionMediaListener method. When the collectionMedia event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    CollectionMediaEvent
